mapper.insert: INSERT INTO account_balances (account_code, balance, last_snapshot_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{accountCode}, #{balance}, #{lastSnapshotAt}, #{updatedAt}) ON CONFLICT (account_code) DO UPDATE SET balance = #{balance}, last_snapshot_at = #{lastSnapshotAt}, updated_at = #{updatedAt}
mapper.select: SELECT account_code, balance, last_snapshot_at, updated_at FROM account_balances ORDER BY account_code
